code:
if [ ! -f models/Yi-Coder-9B-Chat-Q4_K_M.gguf ]; then
    wget -nc -O models/Yi-Coder-9B-Chat-Q4_K_M.gguf "https://huggingface.co/bartowski/Yi-Coder-9B-Chat-GGUF/resolve/main/Yi-Coder-9B-Chat-Q4_K_M.gguf"
else
    echo "Model already exist."
fi

./llama-cli \
    -m models/Yi-Coder-9B-Chat-Q4_K_M.gguf \
    -n 64 \
    -p "Write a quick sort algorithm." \
    > output.txt \
    2>log.txt

if [ -f "output.txt" ]; then
    cat output.txt
else
    echo "Error: output.txt does not exist."
fi
